name: Blood Forest
description:
Warning: the game is really not good and looks like a bunch of different assets integrated to a project (but we didn't use any assets except Unreal Engine starter pack). I just want to say that we understand that, and we didn't want to do that and we even had different models for the characters and music and sounds, but there were some problems during development, that's why the game looks like a garbage. We will do our best not to make these mistakes next time!

You are a vampire who can't live without blood and you lost your blood eery second! So kill as much humans as possible stay alive!

Controls:
Attack - LMB
Movement - WASD
